title: section 4 and section 262 of the Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development Act
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 

2000 (Exempted Development) (No. 3) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall be included in the collective citation the 

Planning and Development Regulations 2001 to 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited planning development act 2000 (exempted development) (no 3) regulation 2020 (2) regulation shall included collective citation planning development regulation 2001 2020

title: section 4 and section 262 of the Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of
heading: In these Regulations “relevant period” means the period commencing on
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “relevant period” means the period commencing on 
the making of these Regulations and ending on the day on which Part 3 of the 
Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public 
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020) ceases to have effect by virtue of subsection 
(3) of section 2 of that Act.
text_norm: 2 regulation relevant period mean period commencing making regulation ending day part 3 health (preservation protection emergency measure public interest) act 2020 (no 1 2020) cease effect virtue subsection (3) section 2 act

title: section 4 and section 262 of the Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of
heading: 3. Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Planning and Development Regulations 2001
text_raw:
3. Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Planning and Development Regulations 2001 
(S.I. No. 600 of 2001) shall have effect during the relevant period as if, in column 
(1) under the heading Class 32, the following paragraph were inserted after 
paragraph (e): 

“(f) 

the construction, erection or alteration of temporary 
awnings, marquees, portable cabins or covered pedestrian 
or set down areas connected with the management of 
airport passenger movement in a State airport (within the 
meaning of Part 2 of the State Airports Act 2004 (No. 32 
of 2004) for purposes connected with the prevention of 
transmission of Covid-19 (within the meaning of the 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th August, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [293] 3 

Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency 
Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 
2020)).”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 August, 2020. 

DARRAGH O'BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Planning and Local Government. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [293]
